column5: How are the roads going this route?
I thought they were pretty good a couple of weeks ago.

Had family come up 502 from Ft Frances yesterday, one spot on 502 had water across part of the road, but no big problem. I was at Sioux Lookout a week ago, only water issue was at the bypass around town by Dick and Nellies, had to go through town and hit the highway on the north end of the railroad overpass if you are going that way, the water may be down enough to use the bypass now.

Just came that way this past Sunday. No issues. One spot early on into 502 from Fort Francis had a little water on the edge of the road, the rest of the way was smooth sailing. Lots of sand bagging in Fort Francis and Sioux Lookout, but it didn't interfere with us passing through.
